message.content:
cs.DS, cs.CG, cs.DM, cs.GT, cs.CC 

Reasoning: 
1. cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) - The paper deals with the problem of finding a shortest path/cycle in graphs, which is a fundamental problem in algorithms and data structures. 
2. cs.CG (Computational Geometry) - The problem of finding a shortest noncontractible cycle in surface-embedded graphs is a variant of the problem of finding a shortest path/cycle in graphs, and is closely related to computational geometry. 
3. cs.DM (Discrete Mathematics) - The paper involves the study of graph theory and discrete mathematics, which are the main topics of this sub-category. 
4. cs.GT (Computer Science and Game Theory) - The paper involves the study of group-labeled graphs, which are used in game theory to model strategic interactions between players. 
5. cs.CC (Computational Complexity) - The paper involves the study of the computational complexity of the shortest path/cycle problem, which is a central topic in computational complexity theory.
